author: wn.com
title: NSCAD hosts UAAC conference (NSCAD University - Nova Scotia College of Art and Design)
text: ( Source : NSCAD University - Nova Scotia College of Art and Design ) NSCAD University is proud to host the 2015 Conference of the Universities Art Association of Canada (UAAC-AAUC) taking place November 5 to 7 in Halifax . NSCAD faculty, staff
